metadata.title: CVE-2024-53976 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: Under certain circumstances, navigating to a webpage would result in theaddress missing from the location URL bar, making it unclear what the URLwas for the loaded webpage. This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS <133.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
